title: EUNE Hextech Crafting DOWN?
body: I can't open chests, switching clients did not help. Is it just me or is EUNE Hextech Crafting down?

replies.body: Are you using any third party programs like overlays or play.tv?  They could be causing issues preventing you from interacting with those assets properly.  Remove them if it's the case for you.  Let me know if that helps!

Ok so, I do not have anything open besides League, it says "Crafting failed!" "It appears this Hextech unit has a bad motivator. Please try restarting your client. If you continue to see this message try again later (It's not working for well over 3 hours) there may be issues with the service. 

If this is chest specific, all I want is a refund as I payed for it.

Are you on the updated client?  It's currently in testing so issues can come up.  What happens if you try the legacy:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

I just loged in, and my chest is missing but a new piece of loot is in my inventory. Looks to me like it got fixed overnight :D

Thanks for the support.
